title: Protecting Controlled Unclassified Information in Nonfederal Systems and Organizations
source_organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
purpose: Provide recommended security requirements for protecting the confidentiality of CUI when the information is resident in nonfederal systems and organizations.
applicability: Nonfederal systems and organizations processing, storing, or transmitting CUI, where not operating on behalf of an agency and no specific CUI safeguarding requirements exist.
